creditline: Gift of Dr. John G. Mayne
description: Rakuchu rakugai screen; six-panels; accordion folded; aerial view of landscape with villages; clusters of buildings throughout including temples, houses, markets and restaurants all connected by roads, pathways and river ways; figures throughout; trees and grasses throughout with rolling hills and a few mountains in distance; gold cloud-like fog billowing horizontally in a few areas; river sections at R of R panel and in three L panels; wide gold border; thin blue and gold silk border around image; black lacquered wood frame; blue paper with silver floral pattern on verso; hidden hinges
dimension:
20 1/2 x 16 1/2 in. (52.07 x 41.91 cm) (image, sheet, R panel)
20 1/2 x 18 1/2 in. (52.07 x 46.99 cm) (image, sheet,  each, 4 middle panels)
20 1/2 x 16 5/8 in. (52.07 x 42.23 cm) (image, sheet, L panel)
28 1/4 x 19 3/8 in. (71.76 x 49.21 cm) (panel, each, R and L )
28 1/4 x 18 5/8 in. (71.76 x 47.31 cm) (panel, each, 4 middle panels)
title: Six-panel folding screen
